newsArray.title: Packers' pathetic 'tush push' ban proposal has nothing to stand on
creator: Eric Smithling, Yardbarker
newsArray.description: If you can't beat it, ban it. That's the defeatist attitude the Packers took when proposing that the NFL forbid teams from running the "tush push," the short-yardage QB-keeper that the Eagles have turned into the league's most un-guardable plays.

newsArray.title: "Si Liverpool fait l'effort, je pense que Salah prolongera"
newsArray.description: "Buteur face à Manchester City (0-2) et meilleur joueur de la saison de Premier League, Mohamed Salah est toujours dans l\u0027inconnu quant à la suite de sa carrière alors que son contrat prend fin en juin. L\u0027Egyptien peut-il vraiment quitter l\u0027Europe alors qu\u0027il semble dans la forme de sa vie ? Dans Tour d\u0027Europe, disponible en podcast, Philippe Auclair évoque l\u0027avenir du Pharaon. (Réal : Seb.Petit)"

newsArray.title: 'Selectively aggressive' Cowboys eye free agency
newsArray.description: Speaking to reporters at the NFL scouting combine Monday in Indianapolis, Dallas Cowboys executive vice president Stephen Jones said the club will be "selectively aggressive" this winter in free agency, adding "we're going to look at everything we can."
